name: Ext_R5_EvidenceVariable_approvalDate
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.EvidenceVariable.approvalDate for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents EvidenceVariable.approvalDate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceVariable|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: When the resource was approved by publisher
element.definition:
The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

See guidance around (not) making local changes to elements [here](https://hl7.org/fhir/canonicalreso.html#localization).
element.comment: `EvidenceVariable.approvalDate` has no related element in R4B:EvidenceVariable
